00079 #include <arboretum/stTypes.h>

00081 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00082 // Class stTreeInfoResult
00083 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00097 class stTreeInfoResult{
00098    public:
00102       virtual ~stTreeInfoResult(){}
00103       
00107       virtual int GetHeight() = 0;
00108       
00112       virtual int GetMinHeight() = 0;
00113       
00118       virtual int GetOptimalHeight() = 0;
00119       
00123       virtual int GetObjectCount() = 0;
00124       
00130       virtual double GetLocalFatFactor(int level) = 0;
00131       
00135       virtual double GetGlobalFatFactor() = 0;
00136       
00141       virtual double GetMeanObjectSize() = 0;
00142       
00147       virtual double GetAbsoluteFatFactor() = 0;
00148       
00153       virtual void Invalidate() = 0;
00154       
00158       virtual bool HasOptimalTree() = 0;
00159 };//end stTreeInfoResult
00160 
00161 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00162 // Class stTreeInformation
00163 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00172 class stTreeInformation: public stTreeInfoResult{
00173    public:
00180       stTreeInformation(int height, int objectCount);
00181       
00185       virtual ~stTreeInformation();    
00186    
00190       virtual int GetHeight(){
00191          return height;
00192       }//end GetHeight
00193       
00197       virtual int GetMinHeight(){
00198          return minHeight;
00199       }//end GetMinHeight
00200       
00205       virtual int GetOptimalHeight(){
00206          return optimalHeight;
00207       }//end GetOptimalHeight
00208       
00212       virtual int GetObjectCount(){
00213          return objectCount;
00214       }//end GetObjectCount
00215       
00221       virtual double GetLocalFatFactor(int level){
00222          Validate();
00223          return levelData[level].FatFactor;
00224       }//end GetLocalFatFactor
00225       
00229       virtual double GetGlobalFatFactor(){
00230          Validate();
00231          return fatFactor;
00232       }//end GetGlobalFatFactor
00233       
00238       virtual double GetMeanObjectSize(){
00239          return double(objectSizeSum) / double(objectSizeCount);
00240       }//end GetMeanObjectSize
00241       
00246       virtual double GetAbsoluteFatFactor(){
00247          Validate();
00248          return bloatFactor;
00249       }//end GetAbsoluteFatFactor
00250       
00255       virtual void Invalidate(){
00256          ready = false;
00257       }//end Invalidate    
00258       
00266       void UpdateIntersections(int level, int n = 1){
00267          Invalidate();
00268          levelData[level].Intersections += n;
00269       }//end UpdateIntersections
00270       
00278       void UpdateNodeCount(int level, int n = 1){
00279          Invalidate();
00280          levelData[level].NodeCount += n;
00281       }//end UpdateNodeCount
00282    
00290       void UpdateObjectCount(int level, int n = 1){
00291          Invalidate();
00292          levelData[level].ObjectCount += n;
00293       }//end UpdateObjectCount
00294       
00303       void UpdateMeanObjectSize(stSize size){
00304          objectSizeSum += size;
00305          objectSizeCount++;
00306       }//end UpdateMeanObjectSize
00307       
00315       void UpdateMinHeight(int height){
00316          if (height < minHeight){
00317             minHeight = height;
00318          }//end if         
00319       }//end UpdateHeight
00320       
00324       virtual bool HasOptimalTree(){
00325          return optimalLevelData != NULL;
00326       }//end HasOptimalTree
00327       
00338       void SetOptimalTreeInfo(int height, int * objectCount, int * nodeCount);
00339       
00354       void CalculateOptimalTreeInfo(int occupation);
00355       
00361       stTreeInformation * Clone();
00362    protected:
00366       struct stLevelInfo{
00370          int Intersections;
00374          int NodeCount;
00378          int ObjectCount;
00382          double FatFactor;
00383       };//end stLevelInfo
00384    
00389       struct stOptimalLevelInfo{
00393          int NodeCount;
00397          int ObjectCount;
00402          double BloatFactor;
00403       };//end stOptimalLevelInfo
00404       
00408       int height;
00409 
00413       int minHeight;
00414                   
00418       double fatFactor;
00419       
00423       double bloatFactor;
00424       
00428       int objectCount;
00429       
00433       stSize objectSizeSum;
00434       
00438       stSize objectSizeCount;
00439       
00443       stLevelInfo * levelData;
00444       
00448       stOptimalLevelInfo * optimalLevelData;
00449       
00453       int optimalHeight;
00454       
00463       bool ready;
00464       
00471       void Validate(){
00472          if (!ready){
00473             Calculate();
00474          }//end if
00475       }//end Validate
00476       
00481       void ResetData();
00482       
00490       void Calculate();
00491 };//end stTreeInformation
